betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Drawbridges are a good block for making moving doors or drawbridges.

They essentially push out blocks placed in 10 slot their inventory and pull them back depening on their redstone state.

The single block slot is used to disguise them as the block placed in that slot and the speed is how quickly it pushes/pulls each block.

You can mix and match blocks placed in its inventory.
